name: X, a game of Y Z
name_original: X, a game of Y Z
description:
Have you ever wondered how long it took Chess to get to its ruleset? Have you ever wondered what would happen if you couldn't use previous experience in its entirety to play a match? Have you ever wondered how much time monkeys in a room full of typewriters would need to achieve Grandmaster level?

Me neither.

A week after the #procjam submission, added a (very) simple A.I. You can download the original submission version.
